import React,{useState} from 'react' // import {Link} from "react-router-dom"; import AddtoCart from "../AddtoCart/AddtoCart.jsx" import "../AddtoCart/AddtoCart.css" function CustomerDish({dish}) { const [count,setCount]=useState(0); const showModal = () => { window.open("#myModal") } return(
{`${dish.dish_name}`}
{`${dish.dish_ingredients}`}
{`${dish.dish_price}`}
{`${dish.dish_description}`}
{`${dish.dish_category}`}
{count}


); } export default CustomerDish;
